about_the_game:
Defeat the Supreme Enemy! Progress through 5 levels of increasing difficulty, dodge their deadly attacks, and eliminate 80% of the blocks to claim victory.

Get ready for an epic battle to save Earth from an alien invasion in Tilebreaker Next Level! The aliens have encased the planet in a network of dark, impenetrable blocks, and it's up to you to shatter them.

Arm yourself and prepare for fast-paced action, dodging deadly enemy attacks and facing off against formidable alien bosses in heart-pumping battles. As you progress through increasingly challenging levels, you'll encounter complex attack patterns, tougher blocks, and unexpected obstacles.

Compete with players worldwide to achieve the fastest completion times and climb the ranks. Can you break into the top 5?

You won't be fighting alone, though! Take control of your powerful hero and keep an eye out for valuable power-ups, such as increased speed, damage, and more. With quick reflexes and strategic thinking, you'll overcome the most daunting challenges and move closer to your ultimate goal: destroying the source of the blocks and restoring light to Earth.

Are you ready to join the fight, save the planet, and experience non-stop action? Let's play Tilebreaker Next Level!
detailed_description:
Defeat the Supreme Enemy! Progress through 5 levels of increasing difficulty, dodge their deadly attacks, and eliminate 80% of the blocks to claim victory.

Get ready for an epic battle to save Earth from an alien invasion in Tilebreaker Next Level! The aliens have encased the planet in a network of dark, impenetrable blocks, and it's up to you to shatter them.

Arm yourself and prepare for fast-paced action, dodging deadly enemy attacks and facing off against formidable alien bosses in heart-pumping battles. As you progress through increasingly challenging levels, you'll encounter complex attack patterns, tougher blocks, and unexpected obstacles.

Compete with players worldwide to achieve the fastest completion times and climb the ranks. Can you break into the top 5?

You won't be fighting alone, though! Take control of your powerful hero and keep an eye out for valuable power-ups, such as increased speed, damage, and more. With quick reflexes and strategic thinking, you'll overcome the most daunting challenges and move closer to your ultimate goal: destroying the source of the blocks and restoring light to Earth.

Are you ready to join the fight, save the planet, and experience non-stop action? Let's play Tilebreaker Next Level!
name: Tilebreaker Next Level Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: Cuad core i3 Intel / Ryzen 3
  • Graphics: Vega 8 APU / Nvidia Gtx 750
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Earth is under attack! Take control and defend the planet in this adrenaline-fueled top-down shooter. Blast through blocks, dodge relentless enemy fire, and face off against formidable bosses. Can you save the Earth in record time? Get ready for the ultimate challenge!
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
